name: Old.InstaSync
description: Classic InstaSync look for the new interface.
additional_info:
v0.5 Still beta...has issues with dropdown menus and the home page isn't themed either
v0.6 Fixed the wonky dropdown issue and made the top nav static
v0.7 Adjusted spacing near footer, finished the home page
v0.8 Tweaked rooms on home page, added customizations for /r/bibby
v0.9 Poll count hover, fixed search alignment issue, themed history tab for bibby script
v1.0 More fixes. Its done. Stick a fork in it.
v1.1 Now works in Chrome! Derp!
v1.2 Fixed alignment of dropdown menus and background color issue in top nav
v1.3 Fixed room info sizing
v1.4 Fixed button alignment issue for v4c script
